alerts.markdown: A small error occurred in Main nuclear sector statistics due to disclosure control. We have corrected this error. We apologise for any inconvenience.

description.title: Main nuclear sector statistics
description.summary: Estimates of activity in the nuclear power sector in 2014 based on results from the 2015 Low Carbon and Renewable Energy (LCRE) Economy Survey.
description.metaDescription: Estimates of activity in the nuclear power sector in 2014 based on results from the 2015 Low Carbon and Renewable Energy (LCRE) Economy Survey.
